class.name: MeshDataTool
class.brief_description: Helper tool to access and edit [Mesh] data.
class.description: The MeshDataTool provides access to individual vertices in a [Mesh]. It allows users to read and edit vertex data of meshes. It also creates an array of faces and edges. To use the MeshDataTool, load a mesh with [method create_from_surface]. When you are finished editing the data commit the data to a mesh with [method commit_to_surface]. Below is an example of how the MeshDataTool may be used. [codeblock] var mdt = MeshDataTool.new() mdt.create_from_surface(mesh, 0) for i in range(mdt.get_vertex_count()): var vertex = mdt.get_vertex(i) ... mdt.set_vertex(i, vertex) mesh.surface_remove(0) mdt.commit_to_surface(mesh) [/codeblock]

method.name: clear
method.description: Clears all data currently in MeshDataTool.

method.name: commit_to_surface
method.description: Adds a new surface to specified [Mesh] with edited data.

method.name: create_from_surface
method.description: Uses specified surface of given [Mesh] to populate data for MeshDataTool. Requires [Mesh] with primitive type [code]PRIMITIVE_TRIANGLES[/code].

method.name: get_edge_count
method.description: Returns the number of edges in this [Mesh].

method.name: get_edge_faces
method.description: Returns array of faces that touch given edge.

method.name: get_edge_meta
method.description: Returns meta information assigned to given edge.

method.name: get_edge_vertex
method.description: Returns index of specified vertex connected to given edge. Vertex argument can only be 0 or 1 because edges are comprised of two vertices.

method.name: get_face_count
method.description: Returns the number of faces in this [Mesh].

method.name: get_face_edge
method.description: Returns specified edge associated with given face. Edge argument must 2 or less because a face only has three edges.

method.name: get_face_meta
method.description: Returns meta data associated with given face.

method.name: get_face_normal
method.description: Calculates and returns face normal of given face.

method.name: get_face_vertex
method.description: Returns specified vertex of given face. Vertex argument must be 2 or less because faces contain three vertices.

method.name: get_format
method.description: Returns format of [Mesh]. Format is an integer made up of [Mesh] format flags combined together. For example, a mesh containing both vertices and normals would return a format of [code]3[/code] because [code]ARRAY_FORMAT_VERTEX[/code] is [code]1[/code] and [code]ARRAY_FORMAT_NORMAL[/code] is [code]2[/code]. For list of format flags see [ArrayMesh].

method.name: get_material
method.description: Returns material assigned to the [Mesh].

method.name: get_vertex
method.description: Returns the vertex at given index.

method.name: get_vertex_bones
method.description: Returns the bones of the given vertex.

method.name: get_vertex_color
method.description: Returns the color of the given vertex.

method.name: get_vertex_count
method.description: Returns the total number of vertices in [Mesh].

method.name: get_vertex_edges
method.description: Returns array of edges that share given vertex.

method.name: get_vertex_faces
method.description: Returns array of faces that share given vertex.

method.name: get_vertex_meta
method.description: Returns meta data associated with given vertex.

method.name: get_vertex_normal
method.description: Returns normal of given vertex.

method.name: get_vertex_tangent
method.description: Returns tangent of given vertex.

method.name: get_vertex_uv
method.description: Returns UV of given vertex.

method.name: get_vertex_uv2
method.description: Returns UV2 of given vertex.

method.name: get_vertex_weights
method.description: Returns bone weights of given vertex.

method.name: set_edge_meta
method.description: Sets the meta data of given edge.

method.name: set_face_meta
method.description: Sets the meta data of given face.

method.name: set_material
method.description: Sets the material to be used by newly constructed [Mesh].

method.name: set_vertex
method.description: Sets the position of given vertex.

method.name: set_vertex_bones
method.description: Sets the bones of given vertex.

method.name: set_vertex_color
method.description: Sets the color of given vertex.

method.name: set_vertex_meta
method.description: Sets the meta data associated with given vertex.

method.name: set_vertex_normal
method.description: Sets the normal of given vertex.

method.name: set_vertex_tangent
method.description: Sets the tangent of given vertex.

method.name: set_vertex_uv
method.description: Sets the UV of given vertex.

method.name: set_vertex_uv2
method.description: Sets the UV2 of given vertex.

method.name: set_vertex_weights
method.description: Sets the bone weights of given vertex.
